mapper.select: SELECT plan.id planId, plan.alarmingId alarmingId, plan.schemeId schemeId, ser.equipmentId equipmentId, equipment.equipmentRfid equipmentRfid, equipment.inboundState equipmentInBoundState FROM plan LEFT JOIN alarm_scheme_equipment_rela aser ON(aser.planId = plan.id AND aser.alarmingId = plan.alarmingId AND aser.schemeId = plan.schemeId) LEFT JOIN scheme_equipment_rela ser ON(aser.seRelaId = ser.id) LEFT JOIN equipment ON(ser.equipmentId = equipment.id) WHERE plan.id = #{planId} AND useState = #{useState}
